ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 97
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Gram 41st level High Elven Paladin Bristlebane server
ygData.messageBody:
> I noticed the forge too. It's not for the paladin armor though, we forge that armor with only two slots (armor mold and bar of ronium, we don't even use water to forge it.) I'm guessing that they either added something to the game, or are going to in the near future. (Maybe we'll be
> able to finally forge things that have magic properties, or they'll add new weapons, or plate mail.)

Gram
41st level High Elven Paladin
Bristlebane server




> Message: 3
> Date: Thu, 4 Nov 1999 14:14:41 -0600
> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
> Subject: What happened to the forge?
>
> Ok, what exactly happened in the patch yesterday? I went to make a suit of
> banded and when I clicked on the forge it now has 10 slots! Did they add
> something and not tell us? What is out there that needs 10 slots to create?
> Is this just part of the Paladin armor quest I have been reading about? I
> looked all over several cities to see if any new molds were there and found
> nothing. If anybody knows the reasoning behind this, please post.
>
> Drizben D'Vorn
> Master Smith on Brell Serilis
>
